meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>period of time</kanji> <kanji>limit</kanji> is the <vocabulary>deadline</vocabulary> for a certain thing. Alternatively, this can describe a <vocabulary>term</vocabulary> for something, like the repayment of debts, or some sort of <vocabulary>due date</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
